data.title: Michael Steven Gray
data.meta_description: Michael Gray, age 70, of Greenwich, passed away early Saturday morning, April 6, 2024, at his home. He was born April 6, 1954, in Crestline, Ohio, to the late Mary […]
data.text:
Michael Gray, age 70, of Greenwich, passed away early Saturday morning, April 6, 2024, at his home.

He was born April 6, 1954, in Crestline, Ohio, to the late Mary Lou (Emmer) and Vernon Gray. Mike was employed as a truck driver for many years. Affectionately known as “Grizz”, he once wrestled a grizzly bear and lost—but lived to tell about it. He loved being around family and every one of them were important to him. In his free time, he enjoyed hunting, fishing, and riding motorcycles.

He is survived by his wife, Lila Axford Gray; four children, Michael (Tiffany) Gray, Jodi (Cierra) Gray, Mary (Teddy) Hiles and Jack (Mandy) Gray; sixteen grandchildren; and nine great-grandchildren. In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by a sister, Helena Souslin.

There will be no services or visitation at this time. Advantage Funeral and Cremation Services by Wappner is honored to serve the family.

Words of condolence may be expressed at www.wappner.com

Funeral Home: Advantage Funeral and Cremation Services by Wappner
